title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 452.1 - Scope of the rules in this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 452.1 - Scope of the rules in this part

State Regulations

The rules in this Part specify conditions and procedures
for measurement of the sound level generated by a motor vehicle engaged in a
highway operation, for the purpose of ascertaining whether the motor vehicle
conforms to the sound level limits set forth in section 386(3)(a) of the New

York State Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
452.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
